Yura

Group (2023-present):
PICKUS

Introduction

Abe Yura is a Japanese singer under TNK Entertainment.

On August 14, 2023, he was revealed as a contestant on MBC's survival show Fan Pick. He ranked 1st place overall, making him a member of the winning group PICKUS. He debuted with the group on April 23, 2024 with the release of the single album "Little Prince".

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7 starting in October 2024.
